title: Neur Principles Majors
description: Students will learn fundamental principles and methods in neuroscience through problem-based study of the neural substrates of animal behavior. For Non-Neuroscience Majors.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (BIOS 1107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1107L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or (BIOS 1207 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 1207L Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
